showScoreExcerpt:
"Kauffman has sacrificed some of the laugh lines for a more naturalistic tone. At first, this seemed to be an error...Gradually, the small scale of the performances draw us in, causing us to listen carefully and become more involved with the people onstage. Those characters are heartbreakingly sad and hilariously eccentric...The casting is another factor in the showâ€™s success...All the choices in this tender revival reveal an involving and human story, unmarred by overdrawn theatrics."
